ch_breach_spend.note: Re-running with improved temporal logic. Previous analysis included false positives from CH API failures (e.g. Molesworth Hotel — has active director since Jan 2021). Only suppliers with dated, confirmed violations now included.

transparency_gap.note: Burnley is the only one of the 3 East Lancashire councils that publishes no description of what it purchases.
transparency_gap.public_interest: This is the single biggest accountability issue.
